00060 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00061 #include <config.h>
00062 #include <library/i_error.h>
00063 #include <Lcode/l_main.h>
00064 #include "lmdes.h"
00065 #include "lmdes_interface.h"
00066 
00067 /* Global variables that the build mdes_info routines use */
00068 static int _build_mdes_info_initialized = 0;
00069 static int **_io_list_dest = NULL;
00070 static int **_io_list_src = NULL;
00071 static int **_io_list_pred = NULL;
00072 static int *_io_list = NULL;
00073 
00074 
00075 static int (*mdes_get_operand_type_fptr) (L_Operand * operand);
00076 
00077 static void
00078 L_initialize_build_mdes_info (void)
00079 {
00080   int dest_size, src_size, pred_size, list_size;
00081   int num_dest, num_src, num_pred;
00082   int num_operands;
00083   int i;
00084 
00085   /* Get the number of each operand type that mdes expects */
00086   num_dest = mdes_num_operands (MDES_DEST);
00087   num_src = mdes_num_operands (MDES_SRC);
00088   num_pred = mdes_num_operands (MDES_PRED);
00089   num_operands = num_dest + num_src + num_pred;
00090 
00091 
00092   /* Make sure Mcode has as least as many operands as mdes */
00093   if (L_max_dest_operand < num_dest)
00094     I_punt ("L_build_cb_mdes_info: mdes dests > mcode dests");
00095   if (L_max_src_operand < num_src)
00096     I_punt ("L_build_cb_mdes_info: mdes srcs > mcode src");
00097   /* Only 1 predicate for now - RAB 
00098    * Changed back to using L_max_pred_operand instead of 1-JCG 7/22/96 
00099    */
00100   if (L_max_pred_operand < num_pred)
00101     I_punt ("L_build_cb_mdes_info: mdes preds > mcode preds");
00102 
00103   dest_size = (L_max_dest_operand + 1) * sizeof (int *);
00104   src_size = (L_max_src_operand + 1) * sizeof (int *);
00105   /* only 1 predicate for now - RAB */
00106   pred_size = (1 /* L_max_pred_operand */  + 1) * sizeof (int *);
00107   list_size = num_operands * sizeof (int);
00108 
00109   if (((_io_list_dest = (int **) malloc (dest_size)) == NULL) ||
00110       ((_io_list_src = (int **) malloc (src_size)) == NULL) ||
00111       ((_io_list_pred = (int **) malloc (pred_size)) == NULL) ||
00112       ((_io_list = (int *) malloc (list_size)) == NULL))
00113     {
00114       I_punt ("L_build_cb_mdes_info: Out of memory");
00115     }
00116 
00117   /*
00118    * Point each dest/src/pred at the propriate place in the io_list
00119    * Initialize the unused entries to NULL (for debugging purposes)
00120    */
00121   for (i = 0; i < num_dest; i++)
00122     _io_list_dest[i] = &_io_list[operand_index (MDES_DEST, i)];
00123   for (; i <= L_max_dest_operand; i++)
00124     _io_list_dest[i] = NULL;
00125 
00126   for (i = 0; i < num_src; i++)
00127     _io_list_src[i] = &_io_list[operand_index (MDES_SRC, i)];
00128   for (; i <= L_max_src_operand; i++)
00129     _io_list_src[i] = NULL;
00130 
00131   for (i = 0; i < num_pred; i++)
00132     _io_list_pred[i] = &_io_list[operand_index (MDES_PRED, i)];
00133 
00134   /* only 1 predicate for now - rab */
00135   for (; i <= 1 /* L_max_pred_operand */ ; i++)
00136     _io_list_pred[i] = NULL;
00137 
00138   /* Get the function from mspec that maps lcode operands to mdes ids */
00139   mdes_get_operand_type_fptr = M_mdes_operand_type ();
00140 
00141   /* Flag that we have initilized everything properly */
00142   _build_mdes_info_initialized = 1;
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 static void
00147 print_mdes_info_debug_info (L_Oper * op, int opcode, char *func_name)
00148 {
00149   int num_dest, num_src, num_pred;
00150   int i;
00151 
00152   fprintf (stderr, "  Func %s, op %i, opcode %i ",
00153            L_fn->name, op->id, opcode);
00154 
00155   /* Print out opcode name if valid opcode */
00156   if ((opcode > lmdes->max_opcode) ||
00157       (opcode < 0) || (lmdes->op_table[opcode] == NULL))
00158     {
00159       fprintf (stderr, "(undefined opcode):\n");
00160     }
00161   else
00162     {
00163       fprintf (stderr, "(%s):\n", lmdes->op_table[opcode]->external_name);
00164     }
00165 
00166   num_dest = mdes_num_operands (MDES_DEST);
00167   num_src = mdes_num_operands (MDES_SRC);
00168   num_pred = mdes_num_operands (MDES_PRED);
00169 
00170   fprintf (stderr, "    Dests: ");
00171   for (i = 0; i < num_dest; i++)
00172     mdes_print_IO_set (stderr, *_io_list_dest[i]);
00173   fprintf (stderr, "\n");
00174 
00175   fprintf (stderr, "    Srcs:  ");
00176   for (i = 0; i < num_src; i++)
00177     mdes_print_IO_set (stderr, *_io_list_src[i]);
00178   fprintf (stderr, "\n");
00179 
00180   fprintf (stderr, "    Preds: ");
00181   for (i = 0; i < num_pred; i++)
00182     mdes_print_IO_set (stderr, *_io_list_pred[i]);
00183   fprintf (stderr, "\n");
00184   I_punt ("%s cannot continue.", func_name);
00185 }
00186 
00187 /* Build the io list for a op, using the function ptr that mspec returned
00188  * for assigning operands ids.
00189  */
00190 static int
00191 mdes_build_iolist (L_Oper * op, int **dest, int **src, int **pred)
00192 {
00193   int i;
00194   int num_dest, num_src, num_pred;
00195   int too_many_operands;
00196 
00197   /* Assume that there are not too many operands */
00198   too_many_operands = 0;
00199 
00200   /* Get number of mdes operands for ease of use */
00201   num_dest = mdes_num_operands (MDES_DEST);
00202   num_src = mdes_num_operands (MDES_SRC);
00203   num_pred = mdes_num_operands (MDES_PRED);
00204 
00205   /* Get each operand types and make sure it doesn't define more
00206    * than the mdes allows
00207    */
00208   for (i = 0; i < num_dest; i++)
00209     *dest[i] = mdes_get_operand_type_fptr (op->dest[i]);
00210 
00211   for (; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
00212     {
00213       if (op->dest[i] != NULL)
00214         {
00215           I_punt ("mdes_build_io_list: op %i dest[%i] out of bounds (%i "
00216                   "defined in mdes.)", op->id, i, num_dest);
00217         }
00218     }
00219 
00220 
00221   for (i = 0; i < num_src; i++)
00222     *src[i] = mdes_get_operand_type_fptr (op->src[i]);
00223 
00224   for (; i < L_max_src_operand; i++)
00225     {
00226       if (op->src[i] != NULL)
00227         {
00228           I_punt ("mdes_build_io_list: op %i src[%i] out of bounds (%i "
00229                   "defined in mdes.)", op->id, i, num_src);
00230         }
00231     }
00232 
00233   /* Only pred[0] is a real operand, the rest are for informational
00234    * purposes only.
00235    */
00236   if (num_pred > 0)
00237     {
00238       *pred[0] = mdes_get_operand_type_fptr (op->pred[0]);
00239 
00240       for (i = 1; i < num_pred; i++)
00241         *pred[i] = mdes_get_operand_type_fptr (NULL);
00242     }
00243 
00244   return op->proc_opc;
00245 }
00246 
00247 
00248 /*
00249  * Mcode interface to mdes.  Builds the mdes_info structure for
00250  * each op in the cb.
00251  * A Mspec function is called to get the mdes operand type for each operand
00252  */
00253 void
00254 L_build_cb_mdes_info (L_Cb * cb)
00255 {
00256   int num_operands, null_operand;
00257   int i;
00258   L_Oper *op;
00259   int opcode;
00260 
00261   /* If this is the first time in this function, initialize everything */
00262   if (!_build_mdes_info_initialized)
00263     {
00264       L_initialize_build_mdes_info ();
00265     }
00266 
00267   /* Get total number of operands (length of io_list) */
00268   num_operands = mdes_operand_count ();
00269   null_operand = mdes_null_operand ();
00270 
00271   /* Build io_list and mdes_info for each oper in cb */
00272   for (op = cb->first_op; op != NULL; op = op->next_op)
00273     {
00274       /* Intialize all the operands in the io_list to NULL */
00275       for (i = 0; i < num_operands; i++)
00276         _io_list[i] = null_operand;
00277 
00278       /* Build the io_list for the oper (dest, src, and pred contain
00279        * pointers to the io_list.  This function also returns
00280        * the opcode to use for this op.
00281        */
00282       opcode = mdes_build_iolist (op, _io_list_dest, _io_list_src,
00283                                   _io_list_pred);
00284 
00285       /* Warn if op->mdse_info is not NULL */
00286       if (op->mdes_info != NULL)
00287         L_warn ("fn %s op %i: free mdes_info before building new mdes_info",
00288                 L_fn->name, op->id);
00289 
00290       /* Build the mdes_info for the oper */
00291       op->mdes_info = build_mdes_info (opcode, _io_list);
00292 
00293       /* Print error message if could not build mdes info */
00294       if (op->mdes_info == NULL)
00295         {
00296           print_mdes_info_debug_info (op, opcode, "L_build_cb_mdes_info");
00297         }
00298     }
00299 }
00300 
00301 /*
00302  * Mcode interface to mdes.  Builds the mdes_info structure for
00303  * an oper.
00304  * A Mspec function is called to get the mdes operand type for each operand
00305  */
00306 void
00307 L_build_oper_mdes_info (L_Oper * op)
00308 {
00309   int num_operands, null_operand;
00310   int i;
00311   int opcode;
00312 
00313   if (op == NULL)
00314     I_punt ("L_build_oper_mdes_info: NULL op passed");
00315 
00316   /* If this is the first time in this function, initialize everything */
00317   if (!_build_mdes_info_initialized)
00318     {
00319       L_initialize_build_mdes_info ();
00320     }
00321 
00322   /* Get total number of operands (length of io_list) */
00323   num_operands = mdes_operand_count ();
00324   null_operand = mdes_null_operand ();
00325 
00326   /* Intialize all the operands in the io_list to NULL */
00327   for (i = 0; i < num_operands; i++)
00328     _io_list[i] = null_operand;
00329 
00330   /* Build the io_list for the oper (dest, src, and pred contain
00331    * pointers to the io_list.  This function also returns
00332    * the opcode to use for this op.
00333    */
00334   opcode = mdes_build_iolist (op, _io_list_dest, _io_list_src, _io_list_pred);
00335 
00336   /* Warn if op->mdse_info is not NULL */
00337   if (op->mdes_info != NULL)
00338     L_warn ("fn %s op %i: free mdes_info before building new mdes_info",
00339             L_fn->name, op->id);
00340 
00341   /* Build the mdes_info for the oper */
00342   op->mdes_info = build_mdes_info (opcode, _io_list);
00343 
00344   /* Print error message if could not build mdes info */
00345   if (op->mdes_info == NULL)
00346     {
00347       print_mdes_info_debug_info (op, opcode, "L_build_cb_mdes_info");
00348     }
00349 }
00350 
00351 
00352 /*
00353  * frees all the mdes_info's allocated for a cb
00354  */
00355 void
00356 L_free_cb_mdes_info (L_Cb * cb)
00357 {
00358   L_Oper *op;
00359 
00360   /* Free the mdes_info for each oper in cb and set field to NULL */
00361   for (op = cb->first_op; op != NULL; op = op->next_op)
00362     {
00363       if (op->mdes_info != NULL)
00364         {
00365           free_mdes_info (op->mdes_info);
00366           op->mdes_info = NULL;
00367         }
00368     }
00369 }
00370 
00371 /*
00372  * frees the oper's mdes info if allocated
00373  */
00374 void
00375 L_free_oper_mdes_info (L_Oper * op)
00376 {
00377   if (op == NULL)
00378     I_punt ("L_free_oper_mdes_info: NULL op passed");
00379 
00380   if (op->mdes_info != NULL)
00381     {
00382       free_mdes_info (op->mdes_info);
00383       op->mdes_info = NULL;
00384     }
00385 }
